website_summaries.verdict: The IS (Iridescent Surface) version of the Furylite II is taking the sneaker market by storm with its simplicity and comfort combined. Taking the DNA of the original Furylite II silhouette, this iteration boasts a monochromatic look in a breathable textile upper for a plush in-shoe feel that sits atop a durable rubber outsole.Like other Furylite II shoe iterations, this particular model impressed reviewers as well for its lightweight and superb comfort. It has this modern and clean look that is loved by the majority of buyers despite the limited colorway options.
pros: Many reviewers agreed that the Reebok Furylite II IS is comfortable on the feet

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Furylite Ii is Ankle-High Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Furylite II IS running shoe by Reebok brings lightweight, responsive materials to a classic runner. The shoe uses a semi elastic lacing system to allow for easy on and off, but still providing a secure fit. The lightweight mesh body of the shoe promotes proper air flow, but is durable enough to stand up to the wear and tear of regular runs. The sole offers an elastic response to impact to support the foot, but offers good traction to unsure sold footing. When you want a lightweight runner that moves with you, the Furylite II is the perfect choice.
